marklogic.body:
Shakers, I'm a bit shaken up tonight.
Today I had a conversation at work with someone I feel very uncomfortable with. He is not a safe person. I do my best to avoid him, which is usually pretty easy because he works in a department on the other side of the building (I also de-friended and blocked him on Facebook), but we happened to be on break at the same time today. I tried to avoid him but somehow he tracked me down and kind of cornered me into a conversation I didn't want to have. He said some derogatory things about a friend of mine that he used to be friends with. I feel bad for not defending my friend but all I could think about was how to get away from this guy. Fortunately a friend I hadn't seen in a while stopped to say hi and I was able to make up an excuse to leave. I'm so mad at myself for not doing a good enough job of avoiding this person and also for not defending my friend. All I could think about was how to get out of this situation with as little trouble as possible. On top of that, today was just an awful day at work. All I could think about today was having a Cold drink and taking a nap. I get three days Off in a row next week, which has never happened since I've been at that job. I hope I can make it until then.
